title: 이달의소녀탐구 #379 (LOONA TV #379)
members: HaSeul, YeoJin, Choerry, Go Won, Chuu, Kim Lip
summary:
0:02 -- HeeJin: "Hi we are all the tall girls of Loona"; Hye: "I am the youngest but the tallest. I also have the most potential"
0:17 -- LOONA Up Unit has a shoot first (More subunits!)
0:21 -- Photoshoot conductor: "HyunJin, are you taking a high school graduation photo?"
0:30 -- HyunJin: "OMG so hot. You have to eat Ice Cream when it's hot. You're hot too, aren't you?" as she blows the fan towards the camera.
0:39 -- Kim Lip is losing it with the heat. JinSoul recalls the time they were in a desert for OEC.
